changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.product_location_network ( id bigserial NOT NULL, -- Otherwise meaningless identifier for a rule product bigint NOT NULL, -- The specific Product being located. contextual_product bigint NOT NULL, -- The Product that is being used as a frame of reference; the one from the 'product' column is located relative to this Product in some way. coordinate bigint NOT NULL, -- The address of 'product' relative to 'contextual_product'. notes character varying, -- Usage notes for this rule updated_by bigint NOT NULL, -- The agency that last updated this rule update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, -- The time at which this rule was last updated agency bigint NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT product_location_network_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT product_location_network_contextual_product_fkey FOREIGN KEY (contextual_product) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_location_network_coordinate_fkey FOREIGN KEY (coordinate) REFERENCES ruleform.coordinate (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_location_network_product_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_location_network_agency_fkey FOREIGN KEY (agency) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_location_network_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.agency (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT product_location_network_product_key UNIQUE (agency , product , contextual_product , coordinate ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE ); COMMENT ON TABLE ruleform.product_location_network IS 'Specifies locational relationships that exist between Entities'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_location_network.id IS 'Otherwise meaningless identifier for a rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_location_network.product IS 'The specific Product being located.'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_location_network.contextual_product IS 'The Product that is being used as a frame of reference; the one from the ''product'' column is located relative to this Product in some way.'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_location_network.coordinate IS 'The address of ''product'' relative to ''contextual_product''.'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_location_network.notes IS 'Usage notes for this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_location_network.updated_by IS 'The agency that last updated this rule'; COMMENT ON COLUMN ruleform.product_location_network.update_date IS 'The time at which this rule was last updated';
